title: bubblr - dummy in trouble
description:
2014-01-30: NEW RELEASE v0.75:
- switched player animations to skeletal animations for more fun :)
- switched Ghost animations to mesh animations
- changed music theme

-------------

bubblr is an addictive 2D arcade bubble shooter, jump and run platformer and will put your reaction skills to the test!

The single player mode is FREE.
The dual player mode can be purchased.

Follow bubblr on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/bubblr

you control "dummy", the crash test dummy, who gets attacked by monsters and has to defend himself and therefore needs your best reaction skills. Dummy has a soap bubble-cannon and can bubble monsters. Furthermore dummy can use the weapons of the attackers and shoot fireballs or fire cannons. 

dummy has to be quick to avoid that more monsters spawn into the area. dummy will get collectable items for neutralized Monsters and completed missions. Most of the items have points.
You will get extra items if you neutralize multiple monsters in a short time ( = hattrick) and if you "kiss" monsters, which means to neutralize them on a very short distance ( = monsterkiss).
Hattricks and monsterkisses raise your rank (please enable Swarm for highscores and ranks).


Target & Hints:
===============
Finish levels by neutralizing all monsters or reaching the exit (if the level has an exit).
Always try to complete the missions. This can be neccessary in order to be able to complete the levels.
If important items fall in unreachable areas you have to start over and try the level again.
Try to be quick, otherwise more monsters may join in.
Try to neutralize multiple monsters in a short time with a jump into the bubbles (hattrick) or to neutralize on very short distance (monsterkiss).

Beware for monsters that escaped out of bubbles, because they will get faster!

Monsters: 
- Alien: walks and jumps, may shoot fireballs
- Ghosts: fly around, get neutralized by fireballs

weapons:
- Bubbles: catch aliens, ghosts will be redirected
- cannons: neutralize only aliens, redirect ghosts
- fireballs: neutralize all monsters
- vertical Laser: neutralize all monsters

Special functions:
- Mine: donÂ´t step on them ;)
- + 1 Life
- Super-Speed
- Super-Jump
- Immortality


integrated third-party products:
=================================

1. Swarm (http://swarmconnect.com)
Online leaderboards for Highscores and Achievements. 
You can connect with your friends at Swarm and compare your bubblr-scores. Signup for Swarm is free of charge, but optional.

2. ACRA for Crash-Reports (http://code.google.com/p/acra)
Sends crash-reports to heavily loaded games, so that we can fix the bugs.


bubblr uses these libraries:
=============================
1. LibGDX (http://libgdx.badlogicgames.com)
2. Box2D physics engine
3. Box2D Lights


We appreciate every kind of feedback!

releases.cert_subject: C = 49, ST = Berlin Germany, L = Berlin, O = heavily loaded games, OU = CEO, CN = Andre Schmode

overview: Released in January 2014 by heavily loaded games.
